bio: Francisco Riveros Escobar is a Senior Cloud Architect from Chile working at Deutsche Telekom. He has spent more than 12 years architecting and developing Software in different industries and big companies such as LATAM, PFG, CSC (DXC) and IBM working as Data & AI Architect. Francisco loves to learn new technologies and is passionate about cloud native development and cloud sustainability creating www.sustainable-clouds.com to show what the different clouds are doing in this area.
title: Senior Cloud Architect
name: Franciso Riveros Escobar
shortBio: Francisco Riveros Escobar is a Senior Cloud Architect from Chile working at Deutsche Telekom.
